pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Carousels with the JavaScript 'Slick' Library // Create and customize interactive carousels using the 'Slick' JavaScript library and the 'htmlwidgets' package. The carousels can contain plots produced in R, images, 'iframes', videos and other 'htmlwidgets'. These carousels can be used directly from the R console, from 'RStudio', in Shiny apps and R Markdown documents.
